clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Gum Acacia on Satiety, Glycemic Response and Gastrointestinal Tolerance

brief_summary.textblock: This study will provide needed insight on the satiety and blood glucose and l effects of the soluble fiber gum acacia at 20g and 40g doses.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a randomized, single-blind, crossover, intervention study testing the satiety and blood glucose effects of the soluble fiber gum acacia.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: subjects will consume 0, and 2 doses of acacia gum
study_design_info.masking_description: fiber will be mixed into orange juice

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 30, 60, 120, 180, and 240 minutes after breakfast; Area under the curve (AUC) will be calculated for each treatment
primary_outcome.description: Blood will be taken via finger stick

primary_outcome.time_frame: 15, 30, 45, 60, 90, 120, 180 and 240 minutes after breakfast; Area under the curve (AUC) will be calculated for each treatment
primary_outcome.description: Subjective visual analog scale (VAS) will be utilized to assess hunger, fullness and desire to eat

arm_group.description: 0 grams fiber added to orange juice
20 grams of acacia gum added to orange juice
40 grams of acacia gum added to orange juice

intervention.description: 20 g of acacia gum will be added to orange juice
40 g of acacia gum will be added to orange juice
No acacia gum will be added to orange juice.
